QuestData.Title: Obtaining Ogre Offensive Orders
QuestData.Description: My sister, Mirana, is scouting the upper bluff while I've checked out the lower area. There are two particular ogre mages that do a lot of bossing around in the lower area.$b$bThey seem to have some orders or scrolls on them that would help us figure out what's really going on.$b$bCollect that information and meet with my sister on the long stairway up there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Crulgorosh's Orders and Thulgork's Orders at Mar'gok's Overwatch.
QuestData.CompletionText: Those orders would be really useful in piecing this whole thing together.
QuestData.RewardText: Glad you are here. I almost got killed up there at the top. Oh what are these papers? This is much worse than I imagined!
